Introduction


Hezz, also known by her real name Hong Eui Jin, is a South Korean singer under Mellow Entertainment. She is a former member of the girl groups SONAMOO and UNI.T.

In 2017, she participated in competition show The Unit. She ended up as the woman contestant with the most votes, and got part of temporary group UNI.T. She will make her solo debut on March 3, 2022 with the digital single "The 8th Spring".
